title: EA Active Logo Font
content:
I'm looking for the name of this font. Something tells me it's custom but does anyone know anything close?

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906062949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/active2_6635.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [active2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906062949/http:/typophile.com/files/active2.png) | 31 KB |
author: filo

comments.content: No ideas? Not even something that might be similar?

It has some striking similarity to Identikal's [Curvature](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906062949/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/curvature/). Perhaps a customization if it?

- Mike Yanega
I certainly see the similarities. I imagine this must be a customization considering it's part of their product logo. Thanks very much Mike.
